title: SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard – Per-Key RGB Illumination – Aircraft Grade Aluminum Alloy Frame – OLED Smart Display (Hybrid Blue Switch)
descriptions:
Introducing the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard, your ultimate gaming companion! This keyboard features hybrid mechanical switches, combining the tactile click of a blue switch with the smoothness of a membrane, providing you with the best of both worlds.

The Apex 5 is equipped with an OLED smart display, allowing you to customize your keyboard with gifs, game information, and even Discord messages. The durable aircraft-grade aluminum alloy frame ensures long-lasting use, while the per-key RGB illumination lets you personalize your setup with dynamic lighting effects.

For added comfort during long gaming sessions, the Apex 5 comes with a premium magnetic wrist rest, offering full palm support and unparalleled comfort. The keyboard measures 35.43 inches in width, 11.81 inches in depth, and 0.16 inches in height (or 900mm x 300mm x 4mm), making it a compact yet powerful addition to your gaming setup.

The Apex 5 is compatible with Windows, Mac OS X, Xbox, and PlayStation, and features IP32 water resistance for added durability. Please note that a USB port is required for use. Experience the perfect blend of performance, comfort, and customization with the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard.
